src:
STIŽE VIKEND, STIŽE MERIDIAN FANTASY: Ko će nas obradovati, a ko naljutiti u Premijer ligi?
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Zile

Vikend je onaj period nedelje kad ljubitelji fudbala uživaju u utakmicama Premijer lige, odigraju poneki tiket, međusobno se nadmeću u Fantasy igri elitnog engleskog takmičenja…

Kad smo kod popularnog „fantazija“, Meridian vam nudi nešto što ostali nemaju – klađenje na učinak igrača u Fantasy takmičenju Premijer lige!
Ko će doneti koliko poena, koga staviti za kapitena, eventualno utrostručiti njegov učinak, ko je povređen, a ko nije „ispoštovao“… Pitanja su koja svaki poklonik ove igre postavlja.

Uz Meridian možete dodatno da se zabavite, pošto vam jedini nudi kvote na igranje Fantasy Premijer lige. Najčešća granica je 5.5 poena, a vaše je da prognozirate da li će određeni igrač osvojiti više ili manje poena u rundi Premijer lige, gde je sada je na redu 11. kolo.


U subotu od 13.30 na teren će izaći fudbaleri Bornmuta i Mančester junajteda.

Džošua King godinama je izbor mnogih pasioniranih igrača „fantazija“, a ukoliko mislite da će osvojiti šest i više poena, čeka vas kvota 2.40.
S druge strane, Markus Rašford je u dobroj formi, a „plus“ na njega, Meridian plaća kvotom 1.90.

Aston Vila dočekuje Liverpul, a Džek Griliš predstavljaće opasnost po vicešampiona.

Granica je 5,5 poena, a ako je miljenik navijača Vile pređe, možete to da naplatite po kvoti 4.50!

U naletu je Lester, koji ovog vikenda gostuje Kristal Palasu.

Juri Tilemans je u Liga kupu pokazao da je u dobroj formi, a ako on bude odigrao sjajno za „lisice“, a na vašem tiketu se nađe da će preći 5,5 bodova – čeka vas kvota tri!
Kapiten Palasa Luka Milivojević bio je strelac protiv Arsenala, a ako očekujete novu dobru partiju našeg reprezentativca i više od šest Fantasy bodova, Meridian vam daje kvotu 3.40!

Bodovanje učinka igrača radi se po ugledu na ono sa zvaničnog sajta Fantasy Premijer lige, a vi ako već niste, pridružite se Meridian Fantasy ligi.


POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
WEEKEND COMES, MERIDIAN FANTASY IS COMING: Who will make us happy and who will make us angry in the Premier League?
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Zile

The weekend is the time of the week when football fans enjoy Premier League games, play some tickets, compete against each other in the Fantasy game of an elite English competition…

When it comes to popular fantasy, Meridian offers you something the rest of us don't have - betting on player performance in Premier League fantasy competition!
Who will score how many points, whom to put for the captain, possibly triple his performance, who is injured and who has not "honored" ... The questions are every fan of this game.

With Meridian you can have more fun, as it is the only one that offers you odds on playing Fantasy Premier League. The most common limit is 5.5 points, and it is yours to predict whether a particular player will score more or less points in the Premier League round, where the 11th round is now in order.


Bornmouth and Manchester United will take the field on Saturday at 1.30pm.

Joshua King has been the choice of many passionate fantasy players for years, and if you think he will score six or more points, the odds are 2.40.
Markus Rushford, on the other hand, is in good shape, with a plus on Meridian paying odds of 1.90.

Aston Villa welcome Liverpool, and Jack Grillish will be a danger to the vice-champion.

The limit is 5.5 points, and if the fan favorite is Yarn, you can charge it at 4.50!

Lester, who is hosting Crystal Palace this weekend, is in a rush.

Yuri Tillemans has shown in the League Cup that he is in good shape, and if he plays great for the Foxes, and on your ticket you find that he will exceed 5.5 points - you have a quota of three!
Palace captain Luka Milivojevic was the scorer against Arsenal, and if you expect a new good game from our national team and more than six Fantasy points, Meridian gives you a odds of 3.40!

Player Performance Scoring is similar to that of the official Fantasy Premier League website, and you, if you have not already, joined the Meridian Fantasy League.
